trans-unit.source: You can search for and staff people to a project.

seg-source.mrk: You can search for and staff people to a project.

target.mrk: 可以搜索项目人员并为其配备人员。

trans-unit.source: You use this function to search for employees or service performers and staff them to a work package.

seg-source.mrk: You use this function to search for employees or service performers and staff them to a work package.

target.mrk: 使用此功能搜索员工或服务实施者，并将他们分配到工作包。

trans-unit.source: The search is performed on all delivery organizations that belong to the company code of the project's service organization. Hence, it is important that cost centers are assigned to their respective service organizations.

seg-source.mrk: The search is performed on all delivery organizations that belong to the company code of the project's service organization.
Hence, it is important that cost centers are assigned to their respective service organizations.

target.mrk: 在属于项目服务组织的公司代码的所有交付组织中执行搜索。
因此，必须确保成本中心已分配到相应的服务组织。

trans-unit.source: This function allows you to only staff someone who has been assigned at least once, with a definite role. Use the <uicontrol>Add Role</uicontrol> function to staff employees or service performers who have never been assigned to a project.

seg-source.mrk: This function allows you to only staff someone who has been assigned at least once, with a definite role.
Use the <uicontrol>Add Role</uicontrol> function to staff employees or service performers who have never been assigned to a project.

target.mrk: 此功能允许您仅配备至少已分配一次且具有限定角色的人员。
使用<uicontrol>添加角色</uicontrol>功能对从未分配到项目的员工或服务实施者进行人员配备。
